entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 09:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then southeast 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
